desc: Open minded people, positive people, open minded person, positive person and anyone who wants to support the movement with an alignment with the morals of the family.

layout.text: ELEVATA is the person, 15:20 is the description. Creating ELEVATA 15:20 awareness, connecting with open-minded people, building positive relationships and an unbelievable movement worldwide. Established in Texas and inspired by abbreviations, acronyms and numbers. For any questions and or concerns feel free to email: elevata1520@gmail.com “15:20 O T for Life. Anything else, ain't right.”
